item.title: 25th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Schedule: 2025-03-25 (Tue) 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM Location: Korea Digital Certification Association (Yeouido Park One Building Tower 2, 48th floor) - https://maps.app.goo.gl/YnxTkz8LjHPXFJBv6 Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 14:00~14:10 Welcome & Opening - - 14:10~14:30 OpenChain Global Update Shane Coughlan, Linux Foundation pptx 14:30~14:50 OpenChain Korea Update Haksung Jang, SK Telecom slide 14:50~15:00 Lightning Talk 1 - Open Source Tech Day 2025 Announcement - Jeong-sook Par, ETRI pdf 15:00~15:30 Mobile ID application “DID”, open source governance strategy and future tasks?

item.title: 26th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Date: 2025-06-16 (Mon) 2:00 PM ~ 5:00 PM Venue: Samsung Electronics Seoul R&D Campus - https://maps.app.goo.gl/ZsQWvnSc5MPXKVcN8 Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 14:00~14:10 Welcome & Opening Suhong Park, Samsung Electronics - 14:10~14:30 OpenChain Global Update Shane Coughlan, Linux Foundation pptx 14:30~14:40 OpenChain Korea Update Haksung Jang, SK Telecom slide 14:40~15:10 Samsung Electronics Open Source 2025 Darae Ahn, Samsung Electronics pptx 15:10~15:50 Networking All - 15:50~16:20 AI Data Compliance Process Jungwon Cho, LG AI Research Institute pdf 16:20~16:50 Lightning Talk - Risks When Using Open AI Models in Enterprises - Changes in Redis Licensing and Its Impact on the Open Source Ecosystem - Yunhwan Jung, Samsung Electronics

item.title: 27th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Date: 2025-10-21 (Tue) 3:00 PM - 4:50 PM Location: Open Source Tech Day 2025, 4F Changjo Room 2 (aT Center - https://maps.app.goo.gl/CcH1kxo8qfQrgp8i8 ) Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 15:00~15:20 OpenChain Global Update Shane Coughlan, Linux Foundation pdf 15:20~15:40 ETRI Open Source Governance Package Sungkwang Eom, ETRI pdf 15:40~16:00 FOSSLight 2.0 Kyungseon Min, LG Electronics pdf 16:00~16:20 Adopting Olive Action Younghwan Kim, Kakao pdf 16:20~16:40 What’s new in OSORI Soim Kim, LG Electronics pdf 16:40~16:50 Can I contribute to open source with AI-generated code?

item.title: 27th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Date and Time: December 9, 2025 (Tuesday), 2:00 PM â€“ 4:50 PM Venue: Hancom Tower (Pangyo - https://maps.app.goo.gl/Nq3XHZtPrg9Zvtzn7) Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 14:00~14:20 OpenChain Update Haksung Jang, SK Telecom - 14:20~14:45 Sharing Hancom’s OpenChain Certification Declaration Preparation Hyunjoo Ryu, Hancom - 14:45~15:10 Introduction to OpenPDF Data Loader and Tips for Open Source Disclosure Using AI Open Source Project Team, Hancom - 15:10~15:50 Networking (Group Discussion) All - 15:50~16:00 Telechips’ OpenChain Certification and Remaining Challenges Jiyoung Yeon, Telechips - 16:00~16:10 About Cryptography Bill of Materials (CBOM) Jinyoung Chae, Samsung SDS - 16:10~16:25 Tooling & Legal Group Major Activities and Review Wonjae Park, LG Electronics - 16:25~16:50 2025 Review & Awards Darae Ahn, Samsung Electronics - Sponsor
